cause.description:
Why i made this group? Because a average canadian kills about 9 trees worth of paper every year thats a lot of paper! so if you join this group you will find some tips on stuff you can do to help wasting paper
1. Reuse old magazines and stuff by giving them to ur friends when ur done reading them
2. Try not to waste paper
3. Trees are homes of animals!
cause.name: Help plant a tree
